definition: can still be considered (to be...)/may after all be accepted as
variant of 為|为[wei4], because of/for/to
variant of 為|为[wei2]/as (i.e. in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)

sentences.english: The combination of evidence and example may be the solution.
sentences.chinese: 这种例证结合的方式或许不失为解决之道。
济慈所作之诗虽简洁却不失为壮丽。

sentences.english: It is also the real response of local architecture of Chu.
sentences.chinese: 虽浮想联翩，亦不失为楚乡土建筑实状的反映。

sentences.english: Practice makes clear, sufficient bath can yet be regarded as a kind of reliable local soak therapeutics.
sentences.chinese: 实践表明，足浴不失为一种可靠的局部浸润疗法。

sentences.english: Ed:I think this is good news for a society with a low birth rate.
sentences.chinese: 我想这对少子化社会来说不失为一个好消息。

sentences.english: The school seems a little remote, but it's still a good opportunity.
sentences.chinese: 校址好像太偏僻些，可是不失为一个机会。

sentences.english: Though they have quarrelled, do not lose it for the best friend.
sentences.chinese: 尽管他们吵过架，但仍不失为最好的朋友。

sentences.english: The unity of dominant and subdominant contents is the development method for the teaching of composition writing.
sentences.chinese: 二者有机统一，就不失为写作教学理性的发展方向。

sentences.english: Go and look around the suburb is a marvellous way to spend a day off.
sentences.chinese: 休息天到郊外走走看看，不失为一个好方法。

sentences.english: It is a good instrument for teaching.
sentences.chinese: 不失为一套好的演示教学仪器。

sentences.english: Numerical simulations provide a possible solution for studying the wave-particle interactions in these events.
sentences.chinese: 数值模拟则不失为一个比较好的研究工具。

sentences.english: After all, cement - Brick production of preferred products.
sentences.chinese: 不失为水泥机砖生产的首选产品。

sentences.english: In spite of their quarrel, they remained the best of friends.
sentences.chinese: 他们尽管吵过架，却仍不失为最好的朋友。

sentences.english: This, after all, is one way of doing it.
It is a small, but enchanting place of worship.
sentences.chinese: 尽管很小，但仍不失为一个富有吸引力的朝圣地。

sentences.english: His calligraphy is full of strength and he is really worthy of being called a master.
sentences.chinese: 他的书法作品骨力遒劲，不失为一位大家。
